house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1988 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: West Usa Realty West Usa Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, EatIn Kitchen, Game Room, Pantry
